mapper.select: /* getTotalChallengeCount */ SELECT COUNT(*) totalChallengeCount FROM OPERATED_CHALLENGE_TB oct INNER JOIN BASE_CHALLENGE_TB bct ON oct.challenge_base_no = bct.base_no INNER JOIN TRANSLATION_TB tt ON bct.base_nm_t_no = tt.trans_no WHERE oct.challenge_st_cd = 'CH01'
mapper.update: /* deactivateOtherPopups */ UPDATE POPUP_TB SET popup_is_on = 0 WHERE popup_no != #{activePopup};
/* activatePopup */ UPDATE POPUP_TB SET popup_is_on = 1 WHERE popup_no = #{activePopup};
